entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:18 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
